TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NavigationCommands extends System.Object
public ref class NavigationCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一組標準的巡覽相關命令。

span.span: Provides a standard set of navigation-related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會公開一組標準的瀏覽的相關命令，包括瀏覽器和文件的導覽。The class exposes a standard set of navigation-related commands, including browser and document navigation. 如需有關命令和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[指揮概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand BrowseBack { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand BrowseBack
Public Shared ReadOnly Property BrowseBack As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ BrowseBack { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得表示 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the command.
The routed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令表示向後巡覽至日誌中的上一頁。This command indicates the intention to navigate back to the previous page in the journal. 和實作支援回應，但是您不需要使用它，在許多情況下該命令的回應中的實作是應用程式寫入器的責任。 and implement support for responding to the , although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand BrowseForward { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand BrowseForward
Public Shared ReadOnly Property BrowseForward As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ BrowseForward { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得表示 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the command.
The routed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令表示要往前巡覽日誌中的下一個頁面。This command indicates the intention to navigate forward the next page in the journal. 和實作支援回應命令時，雖然您不需要使用它，在許多情況下該命令的回應中的實作是應用程式寫入器的責任。 and implement support for responding to the command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand BrowseHome { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand BrowseHome
Public Shared ReadOnly Property BrowseHome As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ BrowseHome { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得表示 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the command.
The routed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令表示要瀏覽首頁。This command indicates the intention to navigate home. 沒有回應的實作命令在任何給定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]類別。There is no implementation for responding to the command on any given [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] class. 因此，您需要提供適當的實作，範例所示。As such, you need to provide an appropriate implementation, which is shown in the example. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: Gets the value that represents the command.
The routed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令表示停止載入瀏覽器。This command indicates the intention to stop the browser loading. 和實作支援回應命令時，雖然您不需要使用它，在許多情況下該命令的回應中的實作是應用程式寫入器的責任。 and implement support for responding to the command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令來管理和瀏覽至 [我的最愛] 表示。This command indicates the intention to manage and navigate to favorites. 沒有回應的實作命令在任何給定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]類別。There is no implementation for responding to the command on any given [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] class. 因此，您需要提供適當的實作，範例所示。As such, you need to provide an appropriate implementation, which is shown in the example. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```
